thread.title: Great hotel close to area attractions but not too close
thread.title_full: Great hotel close to area attractions but not too close - Review of Shelburne NYC-an Affinia hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: kimaiken12
title: Great hotel close to area attractions but not too close
text: I originally thought I wanted to stay in Times Square. I am so glad I didn't. I enjoy a good night sleep. The Shelburne was recommended to me by a coworker. She talked me out of staying in TS. Thankfully I listened. I was very pleased with the size of my room. The small kitchenette was perfect and we used while we were there. The hotel is close to some good restaurants. hotel room was exceptional clean. I love having a view of the Empire State Building from my room. I would highly recommend the hotel.
